thread.section_title: Hotel Monge - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent costumer service
thread.title_full: Excellent costumer service - Review of Hotel Monge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ANDRESG873
title: Excellent costumer service
text: Really nice and beautiful small hotel located next to the latin quater, close to good restaurants and the cathedral of notre dame, the breakfast which was included was very good the room clean and everything looked new, the two employees at the front desk very polite and helpful even if you do no speak french or English the find a way to make you feel welcome and solve all your need everything at a reasonable price, really enjoyed my stay at hotel monge
